body: I keep a running log of how AI did on real tasks. This week's notes: üßµ --- Needed to know when something was removed from a website. I asked ChatGPT "agent mode" to visit the url on wayback machine and figure it out. Five minutes later, it gave me the answer. Save me a ton of tedious clicking, and easily verifiable, too. ‚úîÔ∏è --- Tried the same task with Gemini for Chrome. Total failure -- made up a bunch of dates. Seemed like it didn't have access to click through different links? Not sure what went wrong. ‚úñÔ∏è
title: AI field notes (Oct. 7)
